text: But I'm a Cheerleader is a 1999 American LGBT-based romantic teen comedy-drama movie. The movie stars Natasha Lyonne as a high school cheerleader who thinks she's straight. But then she comes to discover that she's really a lesbian. The MPAA initially gave the movie an NC-17 rating. However, the movie was edited to get the much more marketable R rating. In 2006, the director of this movie criticized the MPAA for being prejudiced toward movies containing gay or lesbian material. But I'm a Cheerleader received mostly bad reviews from critics who did not like the movie. == Other websites == * Category:1999 comedy-drama movies Category:1999 LGBT movies Category:1999 romantic comedy movies Category:1999 romantic drama movies Category:1990s teen comedy movies Category:1990s teen drama movies Category:1990s teen romance movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American teen comedy movies Category:American teen drama movies Category:American teen romance movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:LGBT comedy-drama movies Category:LGBT romance movies Category:American independent movies
title: But I'm a Cheerleader
